sections.title: Step 1: Install Medal.tv
sections.text:
Install Medal.tv to prepare your system for the overlay.
Download it here: https://medal.tv/

sections.title: Step 2: Submit Your Key
sections.text:
Provide your product key to the vendor to receive a custom loader.
Contact the dealer via the provided method (e.g., Discord) and they’ll hook you up.

sections.title: Step 3: Wait for Custom Loader Link
sections.text:
Wait for the vendor to process your key and send you a link to your custom loader.
This can take up to 7 minutes—be patient while it’s being prepared.

sections.title: Step 4: Disable Real-Time Protection and Prepare
sections.text:
In the meantime:
- Turn off real-time protection in Windows Security to prevent the loader from being deleted.
- Download and extract any required runtime files (e.g., Visual C++ Runtimes).
- Run the installer (e.g., install_all.bat) as administrator if provided.

sections.title: Step 5: Run the Custom Loader
sections.text:
Once you receive the custom loader link:
- Download the loader.
- Run it as administrator.
- Enter your key when prompted.
- Wait for the loader to process (it might display a waiting message).
- Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the injection.

sections.title: Step 6: Launch Apex Legends
sections.text:
Stay freaky and launch Apex Legends.
Ensure the game is set to 'Borderless' or 'Windowed' mode in settings for optimal performance.
